classroom.name: @keyframes moveRightLeft
classroom.style: 0% { transform: translateX(0); } 50% { transform: translateX(100%); } 100% { transform: translateX(0); }

classroom.name: @keyframes moveLeftRight
classroom.style: 0% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(180deg); } 50% { transform: translateX(-100%) rotate(180deg); } 100% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(180deg); }

classroom.name: title
classroom.style: color: #33323D; font-family: Ibarra Real Nova, serif; font-size: 40px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: -0.45; line-height: 42px; margin: 0;

classroom.name: titleNarrow
classroom.style: font-family: Ibarra Real Nova, serif; font-size: 32px; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: -0.29px; line-height: 42px; margin: 0;

classroom.name: description
classroom.style: color: rgba(51, 50, 61, 0.8); font-family: Public Sans, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 30px; margin: 0;

classroom.name: button2
classroom.style: align-content: center; background-color: unset; border: 1px solid #33323D; color: #33323D; cursor: pointer; font-family: Public Sans, serif; font-size: 12px; letter-spacing: 2px; max-width: 202px; min-height: 48px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; transition: 250ms; width: 100%;

classroom.name: text1
classroom.style: color: #5FB4A2; font-family: Public Sans, serif; font-weight: bold; line-height: 30px; margin: 0;

const.manageDescription: This project required me to build a fully responsive landing page to the designs provided. I used HTML5, along with CSS Grid and JavaScript for the areas that required interactivity, such as the testimonial slider.
const.bookmarkDescription: This project required me to build a fully responsive landing page to the designs provided. I used HTML5, along with CSS Grid and JavaScript for the areas that required interactivity, such as the features section.
const.insureDescription: This was a small project which mostly consisted of HTML and CSS. I built a fully-responsive landing page. The only JavaScript this project required was to enable the toggling of the mobile navigation.
const.fyloDescription: This project was built in pure HTML and CSS. I had mobile and desktop designs to work to and built it so that it was fully-responsive. I took a mobile-first approach and used modern CSS like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes.
